net.sf.jclal.util.file

Class FileUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jclal.util.file.FileUtil

  • public class FileUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class to handle a file.
    Author:
    Oscar Reyes Pupo, Eduardo Perez Perdomo

      static java.io.File loadFileSourceCode(java.lang.String fileSourcePath)
      Method that allows to load a file to be read that is located inside the source code of a program, ej: config/util.props, if the file cannot be taken to URI format, a copy of his content is created in the temporary folder of the system and the above mentioned file it is returned

                          java.lang.String suffix)
        Creates a temporal file
        Parameters:
        prefix - The prefix of the file
        suffix - The suffix of the file

      • getFilesInDirectory

        public static void getFilesInDirectory(java.io.File directory,
                       java.io.FilenameFilter filter,
                       java.util.List<java.io.File> listToFill)
        Utilitarian method to obtain all the files of a directory that fulfill with a condition.
        Parameters:
        directory - The directory that will be analyzed.
        filter - The filter that will be used.
        listToFill - The list where there will be stored the files that expire with the filter.

      • orderFilesByPathName

        public static void orderFilesByPathName(java.util.List<java.io.File> files,
                        boolean ascendentOrder)
        Parameters:
        files - The files to order.
        ascendentOrder - True if the files will be ordered in ascendent order according with the path, false otherwise.

      • writeFile

        public static void writeFile(java.io.File file,
             java.lang.String content)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Parameters:
        file - The file where the content will be stored, create a new file if it does not exist, the content will be written to the end of the file rather than the beginning
        content - The content
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - The exception to launch

      • loadFileSourceCode

        public static java.io.File loadFileSourceCode(java.lang.String fileSourcePath)
                                       throws java.net.URISyntaxException,
                                              java.io.IOException
        Method that allows to load a file to be read that is located inside the source code of a program, ej: config/util.props, if the file cannot be taken to URI format, a copy of his content is created in the temporary folder of the system and the above mentioned file it is returned
        Parameters:
        fileSourcePath - The path to the source
        Returns:
        The file
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException - The exceptions to launch
        java.io.IOException - The exceptions to launch

        public static void deleteFileIfTemp(java.io.File x)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Delete a file if was created in the temporal directory of the system
        Parameters:
        x - The file to delete
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - The exception to launch

        Make a copy of a file in the temporary folder of the system
        Parameters:
        origin - The file to copy
        Returns:
        The file copied
        Throws:
